body.name: Bidet Attachment for Toilet, Non-Electric Bidet Ultra-Slim Dual Nozzle (Feminine/Rear Wash), Fresh Cold Water Sprayer Bidets for Existing Toilets with Adjustable Pressure Control Easy to Install
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Sunday, February 18 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 12 hrs 7 mins
features: 𝐒𝐀𝐕𝐄 𝐌𝐎𝐍𝐄𝐘 𝐖𝐈𝐓𝐇 𝐄𝐕𝐄𝐑𝐘 𝐔𝐒𝐄--For less than $40, you can enjoy year-round cleanliness without the need to constantly purchase toilet paper. Our toilet bidet offers a level of cleanliness, sanitation, and hygiene that regular toilet paper simply can't match. By adopting this simple change in your home, you'll save money in the long run with our bidet for toilet.

𝐄𝐍𝐇𝐀𝐍𝐂𝐄𝐃 𝐇𝐘𝐆𝐈𝐄𝐍𝐄 𝐖𝐈𝐓𝐇 𝐁𝐈𝐃𝐄𝐓--Our Bidet Foldable Nozzles are designed to remain pristine by staying behind the guard gate when not in use, providing you with the ultimate hygienic experience. Compatible with most bidet toilet seat, our non-electric bidet is suitable for a wide range of bathroom setups.

𝐀𝐃𝐉𝐔𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐁𝐋𝐄 𝐖𝐀𝐓𝐄𝐑 𝐏𝐑𝐄𝐒𝐒𝐔𝐑𝐄--With a chrome ergonomic lever control, you can easily adjust water pressure levels and spray intensity with minimal movement. This toilet bidet attachment’s feature ensures a user-friendly experience, allows individuals with limited mobility to maintain health and hygiene safely that toilet paper can't match.

𝐃𝐔𝐀𝐋 𝐍𝐎𝐙𝐙𝐋𝐄 𝐁𝐈𝐃𝐄𝐓𝐒 𝐅𝐎𝐑 𝐄𝐗𝐈𝐒𝐓𝐈𝐍𝐆 𝐓𝐎𝐈𝐋𝐄𝐓𝐒--Our non-electric toilet bidet features dual nozzles with two spray modes. The first mode is a rear wash, providing thorough cleansing for both men and women. The second mode is a feminine wash, specifically designed for women to feel fresh and clean during their menstrual cycle and pregnancy.

𝐄𝐀𝐒𝐘 𝐈𝐍𝐒𝐓𝐀𝐋𝐋𝐀𝐓𝐈𝐎𝐍 𝐀𝐍𝐃 𝟑𝟔𝟓-𝐃𝐀𝐘 𝐖𝐀𝐑𝐑𝐀𝐍𝐓𝐘--We provide detailed installation instructions and videos to ensure that your bidet installs without issues. Anytime you have problems or concerns about the products, our dedicated customer support team will be available to assist you. Furthermore, we offer a 365-day warranty to make sure you are 100% satisfied.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thing pays for itself in a month
reviews.reviewText: I only use toilet paper to dry off because this thing is a preassure washer for dat ass!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Wonderful to help save on toilet paper
reviews.reviewText: We have recently switched all of our toilets to bidets and we couldn't be happier. This bidet was pretty easy to install and took less than 20 minutes from start to finish. It does have two wash settings with different pressure settings which is perfect for users first starting to use bidets and those who are used to using a bidet. It is a little more on the pricey side for a bidet with the same regular features.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Muy bueno y economico
reviews.reviewText: La fuerza del agua es completamente manejable y muy facil de instalar

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The Hopopro non-electric ultra slim bidet is fantastic! Easy to install (I added a shutoff valve so that when my young grandkids visit, they don't turn it on and walk away!) and very easy to use! Because there are no knobs, sitting for "larger" persons is very comfortable! So happy, bought for all our bathrooms!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Affordable Bidet Attachment – Easy Install, Some Pressure Adjustments Needed
reviews.reviewText: I've had this bidet attachment for three months. The water pressure can feel a bit sharp at times, so I adjust it for the right comfort. It's easy to install, and for the price, it's worth it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sleek and stylish bidet with a lot of power
reviews.reviewText: This was a great purchase. I bought this to put in our guest bathroom, as we already have a different one in our master bathroom. I am so impressed with this, I might switch it out with the one in the master bathroom. Firstly, the design of this bidet is aesthetically pleasing. I love the metal trim. It looks sleek and stylish. Being slim, it sits almost flush on the toilet seat. It almost looks like it is an original part of the toilet seat.I like the up and down lever to change the direction/flow of the water stream. It feels more natural to use than the other types. I think I have better control of the water stream.This bidet was also a breeze to install. It looked intimidating at first, but only took around 15-20 minutes to install. It is simply a matter of disassembling the toilet seat and connecting the included hoses in two places.Unlike some of the other ones I have used, this bidet came with a metal hose and connectors. I can tell it will last a long time.This thing is powerful and accurate. Might even be too powerful for first-time bidet users. However, this can easily be adjusted. In the past, I have had to either adjust my sitting posture or change the angle of the stream a bit to get it right. This one is precise enough to not have to do any of that. Also, you can easily adjust the pressure based on your preference. This is easily done using the swivel lever.It looks more premium than what it is. For the price, you get an excellent bidet that will hopefully also last a long time.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy 5 minute install
reviews.reviewText: Incredibly easy to install. This bidet is perfect—the water pressure is very strong or as soft as you want it with the lever. Although I would love if the water was heated, I didn’t want to have to hire a contractor to connect a hot water connection. After ordering and installing my first one, I immediately ordered another one for my master bathroom. Would wholeheartedly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This bidet is easy to install you just have to get used to the handle adjustment at first since it's not a knob. Happy streaming! : )
